import { useState } from 'react' const Signup = () => { const defaultFormFields = { displayName: '', email: '', password: '', confirmPassword: '', } const [formField, setFormField] = useState(defaultFormFields) const handleChange = (event) => { const { name, value } = event.target setFormField({ ...formField, [name]: value, [name]: 'newvalue' }) } console.log(formField) return (

Sign Up with Email & Password

) } export default Signup
